price: 76. Bakoyekama na bikata(1) ya langi ya pondu na bitoko ya kitoko.
arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ رَفۡرَفٍ خُضۡرٖ وَعَبۡقَرِيٍّ حِسَانٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna ʿalā rafrafin khuḍ'rin waʿabqariyyin ḥisānin
